Invocation Name: sleep meditation
des:
SLEEP
Sleep is the most important part of your life regarding your health and your body recovery. Pro Athletes like Lebron James or Roger Federer try to get at least 10 hours of sleep each day in order to perform at the highest level for several years. 

INSOMNIA
However, about 30% of adults suffer from some form of insomnia. Extensive research shows sleep deprivation increases one’s risk of injuries, reduces muscle building and recovery, and, if it becomes a chronic practice, triggers health consequences that are much more severe (risk of cancer, diabetes, heart disease). 

TECHNOLOGY
Unfortunately, your smartphone might be the biggest root cause for this problem: the LED screen emits blue light which suppresses melatonin (a hormone that affects circadian rhythm and should increase when you are preparing for bedtime), your brain is therefore negatively stimulated and causes you to have troubles falling asleep.

SLEEP WITH ME
Instead of counting sheep, we therefore offer you a skill that will foster relaxation when you lay in bed sleepless. You don’t have to look at your bright phone screen, you simply say: “Alexa, play sleep meditation” and our specially produced sleep meditation (guided meditation) session takes off and brings you to the land of dreams. No long intro, you get a direct gentle meditation that puts you to sleep.

PREMIUM
At the moment we offer only one meditation for users of our free skill. Hit us up if you are interested in more meditations and your own individual background sounds to help you fall asleep.

CONTACT US
Please contact us with feedback or if you experience any issues at: alex@sleepw.me

DISCLAIMER
This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
